description: Owners are being asked to not keep watercraft in coastal locations to avoid them breaking free.
title: Islands coastguards offer advice after kayak searches
title_page: Islands coastguards offer advice after kayak searches - BBC News
maintext: "We recommend that owners do not store watercraft in coastal locations, especially when not in regular use, as this increases the risk of them becoming dislodged or breaking free and being carried away by the tides," said Guernsey's harbourmaster, David Barker.
